channel.title: A ::givepc or ::givepk points command?
channel.description: i know its probably simple but does anyone have a ::givepkpoint (playername) command or pcpoints command?

item.title: A ::givepc or ::givepk points command?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

“sigh”

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“givepkpoint”) && c.playerRights >= 2){
String[] argsS = playerCommand.split(" “);
if (argsS.length == 3) {
String pR = (argsS[1]);
String victim = pR.replace(” ", “_”); // <-----
int points = Integer.parseInt(argsS[2]);

for (int iI = 0; iI < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; iI++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[iI] != null) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[iI].playerName
.equalsIgnoreCase(playerRecieve)) {
Client c2 = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[iI];
c2.pkPoints = (c2.pkPoints + points);
c2.sendMessage("+" + points + " PK Points!");
}

[/code]
Credits to FuckJagex of Rune-Serba
